name: Hallway Hustle
description:
Note that this game is also available from the Google Play Store for easy updates. Due to restrictions on publishing to older Android devices, I've made a file available here should you have pre-Android 11 phones or tablets.

You've just started school. Your goal? Get to your class in 60 seconds or less. In the process, collect lunch money, avoid running into other students (and teachers!), get straight As, and graduate. Repeat until you walk away with a degree from Hallway Hustle University.

Easy, right?

Check your report card regularly by pulling up the clipboard icon, and graduate by clicking the scroll (remember those straight A's). While you're at it, try helping out some of those sick kids by picking up med kits when you see them. It's worth it.
